name: Abeille Royale Face Treatment Oil
reviews: {'title': u'practice makes perfect.', 'text': [u'I bought this because I have been switching my routine towards anti aging. I have very oily skin & only the Becca primer keeps my oil in control. So when I first used this I hated it, the tacky feel never went away & my skin was a disco ball by hour two. However, trust me, I just use this now at night before bed. Right after I cleanse with my Smart Profile & I wake up with plumped skin. It doesn\'t break me out or cause overproduction of oil, during the day, either from nighttime wear. So if you\'re looking for a face oil, serum, cream, etc for wrinkles than this is amazing. No it won\'t dramatically improve your wrinkles but it will plump you skin for a good 12 hours after washing it off in the morning. 4 drops is all it takes, so the price tag isn\'t that steep considering it\'ll last at least a year+'], 'author': u'BrentMaxey ', 'date': [u'2016-09-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Breakout City', 'text': [u'Not only did this feel tacky on my face but it made me break out terribly. I stopped using it and tried again with the same results. Glad I only had a sample.'], 'author': u'belle67 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Luxurious oil', 'text': [u'What I noticed first about this was a wonderful light smell. I had never tried an oil before, and really liked that it didn\'t feel greasy. It is tacky, but I don\'t consider that a bad feature at all, especially given it doesn\'t last long. Used at night and in the morning my skin felt smooth and soft and clear.'], 'author': u'JenRachel ', 'date': [u'2016-07-22'], 'location': u'Rural NC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'very nice, worth it for oily skin', 'text': [u'I first tried this after rinsing off a clay mask. I was expecting a moisture surge, but I was surprised how light it was. I had better results with its daytime use, as it was light enough to not mess with my BB cream. Smells nice. I do agree with the other reviews that the tackiest is weird. It goes away after a few hours. I would recommend this oil to those who are super oily and don\'t like the weight of other oils and serums.'], 'author': u'suckrfish ', 'date': [u'2016-07-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Tacky feel', 'text': [u'I couldn\'t get past the tacky quality of this oil on my face. name: Nirvana Hydrating Treatment Mist
reviews: {'title': u'Does more than you think', 'text': [u'I\'ll start off saying I never write reviews cause I rarely feel strongly enough about anything to do so. I\'m always trying new products and looking for that elusive perfect routine. I bought this sort of on a whim cause I love a lot of the other Josie Maran products. I didn\'t really feel at first like this made a huge difference, especially as I had started using the Josie Maran lotion with SPF daily under primer and makeup and assumed my skin felt so much nicer with that addition (because it is a really nice moisturizer). I was planning on just using this till I ran out but not repurchasing. Expect then I stopped using it when I was almost out (it last quite a few months) and I noticed my skin not being as soft and supple. I didn\'t immediately think it had to do with this since I was changing up some other products I was using. However as soon as I went back to using this twice daily after cleansing and toning and before moisturizing, I noticed within a day or so that my super soft skin was back, and realized that this bottle was actually making a huge difference in how moisturized and soft and nice it felt. I have combo skin, some acne but also occasional dry spots so it\'s always a tricky balance with my skincare but this adds no oil or anything but really makes my skin feel more moisturized and honestly just so soft like my skin has never been. It\'s a bit pricey but it actually does a lot and lasts quite a while and for me it\'s worth it for beautiful skin. I highly recommend it and don\'t see why it would be a problem for other skin types. Also the mist isn\'t really steady but I just do a few spritzes on my face and pat it so it really soaks in and that works fine.'], 'author': u'amandab25 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'glow glow glow', 'text': [u'I bought this item and I fell in love with the aroma and the way it feels on my face very fresh. Awakes my face after a long morning and this just gives life to my full face. Doesn\'t feel oily or greasy and doesn\'t smear makeup. I have combination skin and dry skin but this is my go to mist!!'], 'author': u'PitaChula ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love this!', 'text': [u'I\'ve used this product for months & I love it! It really helps with my dryness, especially around my nose. I just love it, will definitely repurchase.'], 'author': u'ericaashley ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Calendula Redness Rescue Soothing Moisturising Cream
reviews: {'title': u'I LOVE THIS!', 'text': [u'I have rosacea and extremely sensitive skin, and this cream actually made a difference to my skin. I still have redness on my cheeks, but I have tried sooooo many products from many different brands and nothing ever works. Until I tried this one, I can actually tell that part of my redness has disappeared. I don\'t think my skin can ever be completely free of rosacea. This stuff is thick but it absorbs quickly and it works for my skin. I am on my 3rd one already and will continue to purchase'], 'author': u'alalso ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': u'Markham, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'a little last long way', 'text': [u'it has a herbs smell, and when I press it on the face the smell make me feel relaxed. A little goes long way. I also like used it with different moisturizer. Very good. The only thing I give it 4 stars because I have many other moisturizer that I can give 5 stars. {'title': u'tacky and broke me out', 'text': [u'The cream is incredibly thick and my skin drank it up pretty instantly. I returned it and won\'t be repurchasing.', u'note: In regards to the \'fishy\' smell that the reviews mention - I think it\'s a little fishy but also a little like cucumber? Either way, it\'s noticeable.'], 'author': u'sahar ', 'date': [u'2016-09-27'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Leaves skin feeling moisturized and matte', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this cream!! {'title': u'Oil on your face? YES!!!', 'text': [u'When SK-II graciously offered to send me a complimentary bottle of their Facial Treatment Oil in exchange for my honest review, I have to admit, I was a little concerned. I have combination skin, and I thought that adding oil to my already oily areas would lead to massive breakouts. Before I accepted SK-II\'s offer, I did a little research. I\'m so glad I did!', u'I learned that adding high quality oils to your face, not only hydrates the dry skin areas, but it also controls the natural production of sebum (the nasty, natural oil that your face produces) by tricking your face into thinking it has already produced the sebum that the skin needs. The difference is, adding oil to your face actually PREVENTS your face from producing too much sebum. This was mind blowing to me!! You mean, I can actually control my embarrassing breakouts with oil?!? All while hydrating my super dry facial areas? I very quickly accepted SK-II\'s very generous offer. ', u'I was sent a full size bottle of SK-II Facial Treatment Oil. The bottle is 50 ml or 1.6 OZ. It looked rather small to me, because I like to use a lot of facial product, but as I was soon to find out, a little goes a loooooooong way. ', u'The first thing I noticed was the very classy glass bottle packaging. From doing my research, glass bottles are very important when dealing with high quality oils. Plastic can ruin the integrity of the oils. The second thing I noticed was the ingredients label. SK-II is not messing around here folks. This Facial Treatment Oil is packed with wonderful ingredients like Squalane oil, which is very close to the natural sebum that our face produces, Jojoba oil, Avocado oil, and many other skin loving ingredients. I was extremely impressed. I decided to start using the Facial Treatment Oil the following morning. ', u'I love trying new products, so I was excited to try the SK-II Facial Treatment Oil. I washed my face, and dried it well. The instructions explain to shake the oil well. This is very important because the ingredients do separate. I know I mentioned that the bottle seemed small to me, but you only need about 5 drops. This bottle will last a very long time, making it very cost effective! The dispenser makes it extremely easy to dispense one drop at a time, so you don\'t accidentally spill too much of this precious oil treatment into your hand. ', u'I dispensed 5 drops, and rubbed my palms together. I noticed a very light, pleasant smell. It is so light, that it would not bother anybody who is fragrance sensitive. I smoothed it on, making sure I got my whole face, and continued on with my regular facial routine. I noticed after the first day that my T-zone was a little less oily. I only needed to used powder twice, instead of three to four times. Within a week, I noticed a serious difference. My dry patches weren\'t dry anymore. My skin started to feel smooth all over. By 6 weeks, I noticed my skin started feeling silky (Yes!!) and dare I say, a little glowy. As of today, my skin is fantastic. It is no longer combination skin. My friends have commented that I\'m glowing, which is the ultimate compliment, AND.....I no longer have to use powder during the day. I am beyond thrilled! Though the price is slightly steep, the results are nothing short of amazing, and the bottle will last a very long time, making SK-II\'s Facial Treatment Oil a must have product. You will be thankful that you tried it!!!'], 'author': u'sirenajen ', 'date': [u'2016-06-03'], 'location': u'Shakopee, MN', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
ingredient: Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate*, Squalane, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil/Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Olea Europaea Fruit Oil/OleaEuropaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Oryza Sativa Bran Oil/Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Phytosteryl Oleate, Sodium Benzoate, PVP, Methylparaben, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol, Fragrance, Linalool. *Pitera.

{'title': u'Dreadful packaging...excellent product', 'text': [u'Love the product but be xtra careful handling the bottle. Since the product is slippery anyways, the bottle is slippery on its own. name: Tsubaki™ Cleansing Oil-Gel
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I really wanted to love this cleanser, as I\'m in my 30\'s now and really wanted an antioxidant packed non-foaming cleanser. Unfortunately I don\'t like it as much as the Makeup Breakup Cleansing oil, which I only ever use on the very rare occasion I use some make up. It is a really cool concept, it is like a thick oil/gel combo that is very smooth to apply and comes off quite easily. But I had the same problem that I did with another oil cleanser with emulsifiers in it (they\'re what turn it creamy and make it rinse off when you apply water), which is I felt like I still had stuff on my skin afterwards. Not oil, just some sort of film that wasn\'t really going away and all my other products felt like they weren\'t really absorbing so I\'d wake up oily every morning. I think it\'s a great product, just not right for my combination skin type.'], 'author': u'Keila84 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

name: Belle de Jour for a Face in Heaven White Lotus Care
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'Very surprising buy from Sephora. Was looking to replace my la mer, and decided to give this a chance. I\'m so glad that I did. Not as pricey as La Mer, but still a very good solid cream. It is gentle, soothing, and does exactly what it promises. LOOKS AMAZING under makeup, which La Mer doesn\'t do b/c it\'s too heavy. I love it when I find products that aren\'t fancy or popular, yet they out perform those that are. If you\'re on the fence, don\'t be, you will be happy with results.'], 'author': u'SCOX ', 'date': [u'2016-10-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'\u2764\ufe0f\u2764\ufe0f\u2764\ufe0f', 'text': [u'I really love this product. I purchased 3 items from the line and this was the clear stand out. {'title': u"I'm in love", 'text': [u'The first thing I loved about this cream is the smell: it smells like paradise! Then, the texture: soft and thick and not greasy. I\'ve also use the eye cream and night cream. I\'m really in love!'], 'author': u'marieisa ', 'date': [u'2016-04-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Intense Hydration and Baby Soft Skin', 'text': [u'The entire Kenzoki line is fantastic. Everything I\'ve tried has been amazing, this cream included. In combination with the Lotus Eye Cream, I wake up with soft, supple skin. The texture of my face and neck have seriously improved. It fills out fine lines and wrinkles. This really is a very lightweight cream that provides serious hydration.', u'It\'s perfect for the spring and fall months. I use it every day and my face loves it as the heavy creams can cause some breakouts. During the colder weather when my face has been beaten down by the weather, I use this for 4-5 days out of the week and a heavier cream like the Caudalie Premier Cru for the other 2-3 days.', u'The scent of all the Kenzoki Lotus products is intoxicating. It smells sooo good. My husband loves it and tells me how good I smell when I finish my nighttime regimen. I\'ve even got him using it..and his skin rivals mine now. I have yet to try some of the other Kenzoki products but they\'re definitely on my list. I highly suggest this cream to anyone looking for a lightweight nighttime moisturizer. Great for men and women!'], 'author': u'adrishangwen ', 'date': [u'2016-01-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Absorbing balm ...love it !', 'text': [u'Had a few crow lines around the eye area and very dry skin in the winter (live in Quebec) ! I suggested it to my friends that have a combination skin , my daughter that was pregnant and developed scaly skin .... And my husband who swims on a daily basis ... name: Tsubaki™ Deep Hydration Sleeping Mask
reviews: {'title': u'irritating', 'text': [u'i love boscia but not all of their products agree with my skin. This sleeping mask is more like a thick night cream. A little goes a long way. I applied a tiny amount on my face on the first night; it was a bit more sticky than my usual face oil bed time routine. I guess it was because of the Dimethicone in it? I used it again on the second night, and my chin was so irritated on the next morning. I felt the skin on my chin was about to peel off, while my forhead and cheeks were about to break out. If you have sensitive dry skin, please stay away from this product.'], 'author': u'ivy151 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-15'], 'location': u'TORONTO, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Clinique Smart Treatment Oil
reviews: {'title': u'it really is SMART!', 'text': [u'I\'ve always had skin on the drier side, with dry patches that were larger and more noticeable in the winter. I tried this m, as reviews had some of the most positive for any facial oil. I tried this one day under my SPF before makeup, and immediately received compliments on my skin and makeup! This really does have smart technology - although I had predominantly dry skin, I\'m still acne prone with clogged pores in my t-zone, and this both hydrated my dry areas and soothed any blemishes I had without adding more. Product is an oil, but is silky once applied rather than greasy. I use 2x daily; under makeup and before bed. Doesn\'t make my face feel greasy when used under makeup during the day. I will highly recommend this to EVERYONE with dry skin, and it will be a new HG skin product.'], 'author': u'Anonymous ', 'date': [u'2016-11-06'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Crazy hydrating', 'text': [u'This formula definitely takes a little getting used to, but for dry skin, it is amazing. I went through a bit of a learning curve as far as how much I needed to apply. When I first started using it I applied too heavily, and ended up with some extra bumps/breakouts along my cheeks and jawline in the morning. A little less product and a little more massaging it in, and it was perfect. Then once I started Clinique\'s acne 3-step line, it was back to needing more moisture and therefore more product. Basically, the formula of this product adapted beautifully to my skin\'s needs, and it was super easy to control a thin vs. heavy layered application.', u'You definitely feel the radiance right when you apply it. It\'s more of a gel-lotion texture, smoothes on easily, and makes your skin feel cool and clean. The price is a little intimidating for just 50mL, but luckily a little bit goes a long way.'], 'author': u'brittk ', 'date': [u'2016-09-09'], 'location': u'Fargo, ND', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'This product makes me so happy!', 'text': [u'Yes, yes, 1000x yes! I am quickly falling in love with this Vital Treatment Essence, and with Blithe in general. ', u'I have been using this essence for a little over a week as my step after toning but before serum or day moisturizer. I bought it bc I was looking for an additional step in my day routine to give me an extra level of hydration without going too much heavier with my cream - just wanted an extra splash of water-light hydration (not oily or fatty) to make my skin smoother and better able to receive serums and moisturizer on top. I wanted the feeling of a sheet mask without having to buy a kajillion sheet masks.', u'After doing a lot of research of mainly Kbeauty skincare, I discovered Blithe and this treatment essence. It seemed like absolutely everything I was looking for, and I was so happy to see it available on Sephora. Picked it up the moment I could, and gotta say, it looks like my instincts were right! This is a water-light serum type product - thicker than a toner, but lighter than most regular serums or ampoules. I empty a few drops onto my hand, dot my face with the essence and then gently message in. My skin feels INSTANTLY soft and hydrated, and I swear it helps to make any serum or cream sink in that much more easily afterwards. You can use this day or night but I have been using it during the day only so far. I love dabbing this gently under my eyes especially, since that area needs all the hydration it can get. My skin reacts to EVERYTHING, and so far no weird bumps or breakouts from using this product.', u'Blithe has really impressed me so far, and I am anxious to try their Pressed Serums, as well as the Vital Treatment Essence for Lifting (8 Nourishing Beans). I would recommend this product to pretty much any skin type, and for those who feel they want to boost their routine with an additional level of water-fresh hydration.'], 'author': u'elci ', 'date': [u'2016-10-07'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Polyphenol C15 Broad Spectrum SPF20 Anti-Wrinkle Protect Fluid
reviews: {'title': u'love this stuff', 'text': [u'This is my favorite facial moisturizer/sunscreen, hands down - I\'m at the end of one tube and buying two more. Everyone\'s combination skin is different -- but I use it generously in the dry areas and they stay moisturized all day, and it doesn\'t make me break out (which is a big deal because I have adult-onset acne and easily irritated skin). I tried this product because I wanted something that wasn\'t heavy or greasy that I could wear under my foundation -- The Clarins product i was using was discontinued, and gel products never work for me -- and this is perfect. I have never had any incompatibility between it and my other facial products (I mostly use urban decay). And my skin feels so much healthier I have stepped down some of the Rx skin products I was using before. Also, I love the smell - it is citrusy and fresh and not too heavy. I hope they keep this product in their line permanently.'], 'author': u'avarael ', 'date': [u'2016-10-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing for Oil Control', 'text': [u'I absolutely love this product and it\'s become a product that I almost always have a backup of. I tend to come back to this moisturizer whenever I try a new one because it\'s really just that good. Other moisturizers might break me out, but not this one. It keeps my skin hydrated, but it never broke me out. In fact, if I use this on my face after cleansing, I find that it helps my acne heal better than to no moisturizer the affected area instead. This is an absolute must try for someone that\'s going through an acne phase, because that\'s when I started using this and my skin has calmed down significantly.'], 'author': u'DuchessGracie ', 'date': [u'2016-03-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'A nice light gel-cream for the summer, but may not be for everyone or for year-round use. name: Extra Illuminating Moisture Balm
reviews: {'title': u'LOVE the Sample', 'text': [u'I was wandering around the mall before an afternoon job interview and ran into a BB rep who was kind enough to offer me a make-over for the interview. WOW! Totally naturally looking, and I bought just about everything she used on me (which was WAY less than I expected and spent on other brands). She was so kind to send me home with a few samples, one of which was this Xtra Illuminating Balm. Oh my. I ADORE this product and used the sample up in almost a week. I have very dry skin and have resorted to Botox years ago (no judgement please - not for or against). {'title': u'Love it! Back for more.', 'text': [u'This is just what my slightly sensitive, dry skin needed. {'title': u'Perfect for oily skin', 'text': [u'I have been using Est\xe9e Lauder serums for the past few years, since I\'ve turned 30...the CP R and ANR to be specific. I have combination skin that\'s prone to breakouts so I\'ve had some awful experiences with moisturizers, even gel moisturizers. However, at my last visit to the dermatologist, he suggested I start using a moisturizer. The ones sold in his office are double the price of this one and contain almost many similar beneficial ingredients so I went ahead and stuck with my trusted brand of choice. This is probably the only moisturizer that didn\'t make me oily, or cause a breakout, and it seems to be helping with my fine lines and overall skin texture. It wears very well under makeup and I like that it has more skin benefits than simply, moisturizing. I also like that it hydrates my combination skin but doesn\'t cause excess oiliness is my t-zones yet helps to moisturize the areas that are dry or flakey. Another winner from Est\xe9e Lauder. My grandmother, who is 76 and looks 60, swears by the brand and now I know why.'], 'author': u'Dara813 ', 'date': [u'2015-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'love everything', 'text': [u'I bought this when it was $29, so glad I did. I already had both sleeping facials before this so I knew I liked them. The greek yogurt one is very moisturizing, so it makes my oily skin a little greasy by the morning. I prefer the rose mask because I like the smell more and it doesn\'t make my face as greasy. {'title': u'moisturizing, smooth, not heavy', 'text': [u'This product is far and away the standout in this line of skincare. I picked it up anticipating that I would use it at night but, while it is intensely moisturizing, it\'s light enough and absorbs quickly enough that I prefer this to be what I use in the morning under my makeup.', u'A little goes a long way - it isn\'t heavy, and it absorbs in a timely manner without leaving a residue. My face doesn\'t look shiny, oily, or greasy after using this. At night I might put one layer in and then reapply a second layer after five minutes for more intense hydration.', u'It is scented (floral) and it never dissipates entirely, but it does fade after a period of time. I have sensitive skin and I don\'t find that this product stings or burns (even if applying after exfoliation). ', u'I would recommend this night cream to anyone - it\'s appropriate if you want something intensely moisturizing, but it won\'t leave you greasy or oily if you apply it to oilier regions like your t-zone, so it\'s appropriate for combo or oily skin as well.'], 'author': u'frametheface ', 'date': [u'2016-04-25'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Balancing Moisturiser
reviews: {'title': u"The Moisturizer I've been searching for...", 'text': [u'I have combination skin and since entering the latter half of my 30s, I\'ve noticed my skin isn\'t looking as good as it once was and I\'m even starting to get breakouts (which I never used to have). I\'ve found this moisturizer is the one I\'ve been searching for my whole life. It soaks in quickly, makes my face feel silky smooth and has the most incredible spa-like smell. I love it! And I love the way my skin is looking. The stubborn dry spots on my cheek/nose area have disappeared and my oily forehead doesn\'t look as oily. I\'ve also noticed fewer breakouts.I find a little goes a long way so this product will last me a while. It\'s my new favorite must-have.'], 'author': u'DanniNav ', 'date': [u'2016-06-06'], 'location': u'Newburgh, IN', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Repairwear Laser Focus Line Smoothing Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 15 for Very Dry to Dry Combination Skin
reviews: {'title': u'So far so good :)', 'text': [u'I will be honest this is one of the first daily SPF moisturizers I have tried (my doctor recommended I use Cetaphil which was really greasy so I started looking for other options). I am prone to cystic acne, and so far (1 week) it has not caused any breakouts. I follow up with a oil-absorbing sheet to mattify and eliminate shine, and it keeps me feeling moisturized all day. 4/5 because I have not noticed any changes in very fine lines or enlarged pores (which all started after moving to hot, dry, polluted city of LA--- so daily SPF is an absolute must!!!) Skin profile: 29 / F / combo skin'], 'author': u'JessaDL ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'Los Angeles', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u"Great Product - I've Used This For Years", 'text': [u'This recently underwent a name change. (I figured this out at the counter at Macy\'s.) So it is exactly the same product as the old moisturizer Clinique put out. I have very mild rosacea and this along with the Redness Solution cleanser and the green toner from Clinique solves that issue nicely. I can tell when I get lazy and don\'t use enough of this. So I know that it definitely works to keep my skin moisturized, smooth and no itchy rosacea flareups. I\'m 47, live in brutal Las Vegas weather and thanks to genetics and these clinique products I look much younger. I don\'t have any aging lines or dark shadows under my eyes at all and am frequently told I look to be in my early 30\'s. You must use this for an extended time (a few months) and day and night to get the benefit. Using for a week off and on isn\'t going to cut it. Nor would it with ANY product like this.'], 'author': u'Laneycakes ', 'date': [u'2016-07-01'], 'location': u'Las Vegas, NV', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

{'title': u'Moisture Rich but Nothing Else', 'text': [u'My skin is soft but my forehead is dry again after an hour. It\'s super thick but blends in non-greasy which is nice. But it didn\'t reduce lines, wrinkles, or pores. I\'m a non-smoker in my early 30\'s so my "lines" are not bad at all. I\'m disappointed for the price I paid.'], 'author': u'Louise13 ', 'date': [u'2016-05-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'smooooth', 'text': [u'I decided a while ago to up my skincare routine, I\'m looking at 30 and wanted to start preventive measure: I have been using this product for the past 3 weeks, day and night. {'title': u'smells', 'text': [u'I\'m almost 30 and have pale skin, so I don\'t have a lot of skin issues and it\'s difficult to get my pale skin to really show a glow. However, after using it I did see some illuminating of the skin and it\'s not too oily nor does it sit on the skin like most illuminating BB creams. Hopefully with time it will clear up some minor hyper pigmentation I have on my nose and cheeks, but I\'ve found when a product does start to have an effect on that it usually takes a month (philosophy\'s when hope is not enough serum is a wonderful start, especially if you have scars). BUT the problem with this product is the smell! It\'s not overly strong, so I\'ll keep it, but there\'s definitely a bad odor--like urine almost. I\'ve never used a retinol cream so perhaps it\'s that. I will say if my hair, skin and perfume didn\'t all smell nice if probably notice the scent more and maybe take it back'], 'author': u'curlypalechic ', 'date': [u'2016-06-29'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Xtend Your Youth Face Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Staple Lotion', 'text': [u'I never make product reviews, however recently I have been considering changing my moisturizer... but then I started thinking about this product. name: Plantscription™ Youth-Renewing Face Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Fantastic eye treatment', 'text': [u'I was looking for a new eye cream (currently use Benefit eye bright), and got a sample of this stuff (little pod). I have combination sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts with anything oily. I gave this a shot as a substitute eye treatment (after a few glasses of wine, I was throwing caution into the wind). And who knew, it was amazing! The next morning my fine lines had started smoothing and my under eyes were bright and youthful! I\'m in my early 30\'s so I\'m frequently fighting those new little lines.That single pod has lasted me nearly a month now, using it every day. I use 1 drop under each eye at night and I don\'t think I\'ll be going back to my previous eye creams.I don\'t think I\'ll use this on my entire face since the level of hydration it provides is a bit much for my habitually oily areas.', u'Happy hydrating!'], 'author': u'renems ', 'date': [u'2016-04-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'compliments on the 1st day!', 'text': [u'Ok, yes it CAN be oily, so I use only a drop or two. It absorbs nicely, feels good, and must make some difference- the morning after I tried it, four people complimented my skin, and nothing else had changed. Worth it!'], 'author': u'barady1201 ', 'date': [u'2015-11-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'favorite facial cleanser', 'text': [u'This is my favorite cleanser of all time. Light smell, takes just a small amount to be effective.'], 'author': u'freezetime75 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'yay purity!', 'text': [u'I love using Purity cleanser on both my face and on my brushes. It\'s not overly expensive and a little goes a long way (especially as a brush cleanser!) Before this, I had been using a sample size bottle of the cleanser for months; I was really surprised how long such a small amount lasted...', u'in the other hand, I don\'t like this moisturizer. at all. I don\'t even care that it was basically free, (since the cleanser is always that price for this size) I just really don\'t like it. For being a gel, it\'s awfully heavy and leaves my skin really greasy, like it won\'t sink in... but the worst part is the smell. Ugh. I don\'t know what it\'s fragranced with, but girrll, it\'s strong. nose crinkling strong, and even once I was done, I could still smell my own face for hours!', u'A on the face wash (I think it just smells fresh, not chemically or otherwise bad) and D- on the moisturizer for getting wrong everything the cleanser got right!'], 'author': u'jonirae319 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Surprising find!', 'text': [u'I saw a good review for this and thought why not just pick one up its a great price and my skin is loving it! {'title': u'Good for combination skin', 'text': [u'I recently repurchased this toner. I think that the price is reasonable. It lasts me about 3 months of daily use. I transfer some of the toner into a never used travel perfume spray bottle. I mist my face with it every time after I wash my skin.', u'Most toners have too much fragrance or harmful ingredients and this one has very little of those things. Many are concerned about the witch hazel water, but it doesn\'t dry out my skin. The fragrance is very light and natural smelling.', u'I have combination skin that leans towards oily. I like this toner because of the way it leaves my skin feeling refreshed, soothed and not tight. It has green tea extract and other antioxidants as well as peptides and soothing plant extracts that are good for the skin.'], 'author': u'hanami ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': u'New York', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'awesome!', 'text': [u'Very moisturizing ! So pleased with this product. I\'ve been using this every night for a week and wake up every morning with smooth, moisturized skin. {'title': u'Great concept,', 'text': [u'I really wanted to like this. It\'s a great idea but so far has not delivered for me. I\'ve been using it about a week now and so far it\'s fine but not anything special. I bought the kind formulated for my oily skin and I still found it to be greasy and slow to absorb, although it did eventually do so. In the morning, my skin does seem moisturized but I\'m not seeing much of a difference in terms of tone, texture or lines. In fact I\'ve noticed some new tiny blemishes in places I don\'t usually have them, which could be from something else, but this is the only new product I\'m trying right now. I do use the 3-step system regularly (skin type 3, combination oily). I can\'t decide if I want to finish the jar and see if it gets better or send it back. Either way, I don\'t think I\'ll be purchasing this again. I really like the repair wear laser focus and turnaround overnight radiant lines and was hoping this would replace both, but not so much for me.'], 'author': u'sabriel77 ', 'date': [u'2016-07-11'], 'location': u'Eastern North Carolina', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'my go-to summer night moisturizer', 'text': [u'I had this sitting around and I finally started to use it. In the summer I have normal skin with an oily t-zone. After the first few days of use as the last part of my nightly skincare routine, I found my skin to be even toned, rid of texture, and more radiant. I\'ve been using it ever since and could not be happier with the appearance of my skin when I wake up!!!! I love the feel of this night cream and amazed at all the work it does when I am sound asleep. :)'], 'author': u'mwoohoohh ', 'date': [u'2016-06-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Worth A Try', 'text': [u'After using this for 6+ months while living in Miami, I\'ve concluded that this is my go-to moisturizer. Having really tanned skin already, this not only noticeably softens my skin and even out my skin tone, buy does create the glow with a pleasant ratio of ingredients. I have sensitive skin, and this moisturizer even seems to heal any break-outs (which have become sparse since using this product). I highly recommend to try this if looking for a facial tanner. It is best to use at night, but can definitely be worn during the day. If I apply it at night, I wake up with even toned, glowy (not shiny) skin. During the day, it can be a bit shiny on my oily skin, and do not recommend to wear under make-up due to the time-release dha. Wear it alone for optimal results.'], 'author': u'SKYOUNG ', 'date': [u'2016-06-11'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Hydra Sebum Control Essence
reviews: {'title': u'heaven sent!', 'text': [u'I absolutely 100% love this stuff. I have dry, oily, crazy skin that seems to change daily. I\'ve lived in NYC, Seattle, San Diego, and now super hot, humid, AL. I used it in S. Korea, Japan and S. America and it works the same in all climates/conditions for me. I put this first after I wash my face in the morning and it keeps my face balanced and evenly hydrated without any greasy residue. I still apply sunscreen/lotion and then makeup too. Even in 95+ heat and lots of humidity it keeps my face balanced and fairly matte all day. I do get some oilyness by the end of the day, but that\'s just how it goes as your body produces oil during the day-just use blotting paper to remove it.'], 'author': u'julesb8 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': u'NY, AL, CA, WA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u"doesn't do what it advertises", 'text': [u'This product did not seem to help prevent oil or shine for me. {'title': u'flabbergasted', 'text': [u'I bought this on a whim not really expecting much. I\'ve always had oily skin, like gulf oil spill kind of oily skin. my makeup usually melts off by midmorning. reviews: {'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'I was SUPER skeptical trying this new formula out. name: Hydrating Gel Cream
reviews: {'title': u'For oily to normal and non acne prone skin types', 'text': [u'My skin is normal to dry but I still get product related breakouts so I tend to stay away from heavier moisturizers. Not only was this not moisturizing enough, it left my cheeks feeling sort of rough and uneven, and I experienced two whiteheads on my chin within a week.There must be an ingredient or two in this my skin doesn\'t like. {'title': u'Staple moisturizer', 'text': [u'This moisturizer absorbs quickly and does not leave my face feeling greasy or shiney. This "gel" moisturizer feels slightly cool when applying. Very light on the skin, but delivers the right amount of moisture. I use the vitamin based cream during the day and apply this gel cream at night. There is a light scent,but not perfumy. This is my 3rd jar.'], 'author': u'mesolovely ', 'date': [u'2015-07-05'], 'location': u'Miami, FL', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'great lightweight for sensitive skin', 'text': [u'I love this, but I like the cream even better. The gel is perfect for the summer months.'], 'author': u'kmtatro ', 'date': [u'2014-12-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'I am shocked at all the reviews!!', 'text': [u'I am so surprised at all the reviews that rave about this gel cream. I am sitting here at day 7 of my reaction to this product and my face looks horrendous. I am not normally the type of person who gets reactions to products and if by some chance there were an adverse affect from using something new, it would be something like a few pimples here or there. I normally have completely clear and smooth skin. This cream made my entire face breakout in tiny whiteheads from my forehead, cheeks, jawline, and down the sides of my neck. I used this for 3 days in a row only in the mornings (it was the only new product in my routine.) and by the third day I could see redness showing up on my neck. Bottom line, this product was not great for me. It smells so strong (first time I\'ve ever complained about a products smell being too strong) it almost felt as if I was rubbing hand soap into my face. The smell reminded me of bar soap, I\'m just mad that I tossed my receipt. It was already in the trash by the morning of day 4 when my face looked like I was an alien. I wouldn\'t give it to anyone I know. I wish I could have gotten a sample before I wasted my money on this product. Grrr!!'], 'author': u'kpark1 ', 'date': [u'2014-05-31'], 'location': u'Denver, CO', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'feels like cool ice on skin :-)', 'text': [u'I am very impressed. Bobbi, you had me at hello with this gel.'], 'author': u'Rereboo ', 'date': [u'2014-01-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Flawless Skin Repair Crème
reviews: {'title': u'Smooth, plump skin.', 'text': [u'I have been using this moisturizer off and on now for 3 years. I was actually in fact 23 when I first tried this. I had used Laura\'s Mega Moisture and the hydrating mist and loved them. I have ver dry, eczema prone skin, and prevention was key. I have only gone through about 3 jars. Since I work in cosmetics I tend to try new things or just kinda alternate, hah. Every time I go back and try this I am surprised again at why I stopped. -1 star for jar packaging though. I use a spatula but generally prefer a pump.'], 'author': u'freshflesh ', 'date': [u'2015-03-23'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Did not work for me', 'text': [u'I got this mouistorizer on a kit and I hate it. I have combo skin mostly oily I get dry around the mouth (below cheeks) so I was hoping this would help me hydrate as is freezing where I live right now. This moisturizer is horrible on my skin it\'s super heavy, greasy OMGGG I look like Ive been outside on a summer day literally. My skin does not abosrb it so my skin looks oily oily oily. Wouldn\'t recommend for oily skin.'], 'author': u'Lupita1290 ', 'date': [u'2015-02-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it.', 'text': [u'I am now 40, although at the tender age of 27 my skin took a (hormonally caused?) turn for the worse. Up until 27, my skin was flawless, low maintenance, and pimple free. Never used moisturizer, never used foundation, only washed my face when I showered daily. Not the case anymore. I have an extreme t-zone sitch going on: supremely oily on the forehead and chin and supremely dry everywhere else. That said, I tried this and surprisingly it works phenomenally well for my entire face. Even my chin. In fact, the milia on my chin have disappeared (except of one). Looks like my chin needed just a bit more moisturizing. I have tried soooo many other products, but for some reason nothing else worked. I don\'t need much either.'], 'author': u'erinkc ', 'date': [u'2014-12-12'], 'location': u'Fort Collins, CO', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'heavy, clogs pores', 'text': [u'I\'m early 40\'s, with aging, but combo skin and large pores in T zone. I had great hopes for this cream based on all the reviews, but I found it very heavy and thick, and hard to spread over my skin without serious rubbing. It made my pores more noticeable, clogged and dirty looking and after a week\'s use gave me white heads. The large jar without any kind of spatula is unpleasant to use. Perhaps better suited for dry, more fragile skin.'], 'author': u'paleperson ', 'date': [u'2014-02-21'], 'location': u'boston, ma', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I have dry skin and usually extremely dry in the winter. I LOVE this product. It keeps my face hydrated and absorbs quickly. It\'s moisturizing and light weight. Makes my skin soft... They used to have the day cream for this with SPF 15, I\'m not sure why they took it away.. I hope it comes back. There\'s something in this cream that just makes my skin glow. However I wish the price was more reasonable... I\'m constantly trying new face creams to replace this one because I don\'t think I can keep affording this face cream. :('], 'author': u'calichick27 ', 'date': [u'2013-11-16'], 'location': u'Los Angeles', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'This cream does wonders!', 'text': [u'I am 27 years old. I\'ve used this for five years. I\'ve had acne problems most of my life. This was the one cream that cleared up my acne. {'title': u'Decent', 'text': [u'I received this as a sample (0.5 oz) and it lasted me at least a month and I used it during the day. First off I have sensitive and very dry skin. This product was pleasant and light enough for me and yes it absorbed quickly which also meant that my skin felt dry about 30 mins after I applied it so I ended up either having to reapply it again within the hour or just going back my regular moisturizer. I liked it because it was free and came with purchase, but other than that I did not see any changes to my skin and most likely will not be purchasing the full size of this product.'], 'author': u'shuumerauser ', 'date': [u'2015-01-08'], 'location': u'Roseville,CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Plantscription™ Powerful Lifting Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Moisturizing', 'text': [u'I switched to this cream from the one with with SPF (plantscription line) and found this cream to be more moisturizing. I had a hard time with my primer after waiting 10 min or more after applying this moisturizer, as the primer would just ball up and roll off my skin. I have normal to combination skin. This cream would be great for winter, when my skin is drier. You need to use very little for good moisturization but it doesn\'t feel heavy even when you put on a lot. Overall I still really like this cream. I use it as preventative for aging, so I can\'t say much about it\'s effectiveness in this aspect'], 'author': u'CCT1 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-30'], 'location': u'Ottawa', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Daily Deflector™ Waterlight Broad Spectrum SPF 50+ PA+++ Anti-Aging Sunscreen
reviews: {'title': u'Really want to love this badly! but....', 'text': [u'This sunscreen is almost going to be my fav one, its very light weight, its not that greasy but you definitely will feel you have something om your face but that didnt bother me compare to other sunscreen its less greasy feeling. It does leave white cast on your face, and the worse part it broke me out so bad! Sigh. I will be returning this as soon as I get back home. Im still on the search of a sunscreen that will work for me. I have a very oily acne prone skin, if u guys know anything that works please let me know! Ty!'], 'author': u'Howzit ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'This is a good primer. I think the people that are having issues with their face turning white are using too much product. It come in a tiny bottle and the solution is extremely liquid, so you\'re only suppose to use a few dots. I have combination skin and it does not feel oily even with a moisturizer and living in south florida which is great. I use it as a primer and it does a pretty good job at that. It also passes the photo flash test. It\'s pretty good and would probably buy again.'], 'author': u'Berlice ', 'date': [u'2016-09-10'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'White, or is it you?', 'text': [u'I received this in a sample size at my local sephora and a woman who was representing Kate Somerville did a full facial on me with the line. She explained to me how this works, and why so many people are seeing their face turn white after they use it. She suggested warming up the product in your hand and pressing it into the skin, rather than rubbing it in. I have used it in this way and I must say, it really does reduce the whiteness of the sunscreen. That being said, you have to pat it into the skin, and that takes a little bit of extra time. You don\'t want to put too much of this, though, because no matter how much you pat it in after that, you\'ll look white. I wouldn\'t say this is a bad product, it is just made for certain skin types. If you like a different spf product, use that instead.'], 'author': u'barkingbeauty ', 'date': [u'2016-08-14'], 'location': u'Lake Forest, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'18-24'}
